duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform testing and additional testing required for sleep disorder.
Score, interpret, and report results of sleep studies.
Educate patients about test results, sleep disorders, community support groups, and available resources.
Prepare, calibrate, repair, and maintain equipment required for testing.
Determine and report needed repairs and replacements.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED. Preferred: Graduate of an accredited Polysomnography or Respiratory Therapy program.
